13  package org.sonatype.goodies.dropwizard.env;
14  
15  import java.net.InetAddress;
16  import java.net.NetworkInterface;
17  import java.nio.file.FileStore;
18  import java.nio.file.FileSystems;
19  import java.util.Collections;
20  import java.util.stream.Collectors;
21  
22  import org.slf4j.Logger;
23  
24  /**
25   * Detailed {@link EnvironmentReporter}.
26   *
27   * @since 1.2.0
28   */
29  public class DetailedEnvironmentReporter
30    extends BasicEnvironmentReporter
31  {
32    @Override
33    public void report(final Logger logger) throws Exception {
34      super.report(logger);
35  
36      Runtime runtime = Runtime.getRuntime();
37      logger.info("CPU; processors={}", runtime.availableProcessors());
38      logger.info("Memory; free={}, total={}, max={}",
39          runtime.freeMemory(),
40          runtime.totalMemory(),
41          runtime.maxMemory()
42      );
43  
44      for (FileStore fileStore : FileSystems.getDefault().getFileStores()) {
45        logger.info("File-store; name={}, type={}, total={}, usable={}, unallocated={}, read-only={}",
46            fileStore.name(),
47            fileStore.type(),
48            fileStore.getTotalSpace(),
49            fileStore.getUsableSpace(),
50            fileStore.getUnallocatedSpace(),
51            fileStore.isReadOnly()
52        );
53      }
54  
55      for (NetworkInterface intf : Collections.list(NetworkInterface.getNetworkInterfaces())) {
56        logger.info("Network-interface: name={}, display-name={}, up={}, virtual={}, multicast={}, loopback={}, ptp={}, mtu={}, addresses={}",
57            intf.getName(),
58            intf.getDisplayName(),
59            intf.isUp(),
60            intf.isVirtual(),
61            intf.supportsMulticast(),
62            intf.isLoopback(),
63            intf.isPointToPoint(),
64            intf.getMTU(),
65            Collections.list(intf.getInetAddresses()).stream()
66                .map(InetAddress::toString)
67                .collect(Collectors.joining(", "))
68        );
69      }
70    }
71  }
